data.title: Romain Ferrier EA FC FIFA 05 Career Mode
data.meta_description: Romain Ferrier plays as a Full Back for Ciudad de Murcia. In FIFA 05, Ferrier got a rating of 51 and a potential of 79. View all his stats at FIFA Index.
data.text: Romain Ferrier was born on Feb. 24, 1976. He is currently 28 years old and plays as a Full Back. His overall rating in FIFA 05 is 51 with a potential of 79. He prefers to shoot with his right foot. Ferrier's height is 180 cm cm and his weight is estimated at 71 kg kg according to our database. Currently, Romain Ferrier is playing with number 15. His best stats are: Stamina: 75, Strength: 74, Tackling: 70, Pace: 68, Passing: 65.
